source:
（体にいいという噂を聞き、サウナにやってきた
のだが、この時間は人が少ないみたいだ……）
translatedstr:
(I came to the sauna because I heard a rumor that it was good for me.
(But there don't seem to be many people at this time of the day. ......)

source: おっ、何や、今日は先客がおんのかい
translatedstr: Oh, what, you have a visitor today?

character: サウナ好きのオッサン
source:
おう、兄ちゃん、見ぃひん顔やな。
ココ初めてなん？
translatedstr:
Oh, brother, you don't look familiar.
Are you new to this place?

source:
はい。体にいいという噂を聞いてきてみました。
お見受けしたところ、常連さんのようですが……
translatedstr:
Yes, I came here because I heard a rumor that it is good for you.
From what I can see, you are a regular ......

character: サウナ好きのオッサン
source:
常連も常連！　そらもう、ヌシっちゅうくらいの
常連や！　ココのオートロウリュは最高やでホンマ！
translatedstr:
Regulars are regulars, too! They're so regular, they're like nushis.
I'm a regular! The auto-lauryu at this place is the best, really!

character: サウナ好きのオッサン
source:
……ところで兄ちゃん、仕事、何してん？　こない
真っ昼間にサウナて、普通の職業ちゃうやろ？

...... By the way, brother, what are you doing at work? I'm not coming.
Sauna in the middle of the day, that's not a normal occupation, is it?

（親切そうな人みたいだし、なにやら同業者の
雰囲気がするぞ。よし、ここは正直に……）
translatedstr:
(She seems like a kind person and something of a peer.
I'm getting a vibe here, okay, let's be honest here: ......)

source:
プロジェクトルミナスという、

translatedstr:
It is called Project Luminous,
I am a producer of an idol unit

character: サウナ好きのオッサン
source:
アイドルのプロデューサー！？　ホンマか！？
ワシもそれでブイブイ言わしとった時代あったわ！
translatedstr:
Idol producer! Really?
There was a time when I was doing well with it!

source:
『金成大蔵』って知らんか？
それ、ワシや、ワシ！
translatedstr:
Have you ever heard of "Kinsei Daizo"?
That's an eagle, an eagle!

source:
金成大蔵さん……確か、２５年以上前に人気絶頂
だったアイドルのプロデューサーをしていたという
translatedstr:
Ms. Daizo Kananari ......, as I recall, was at the height of her popularity more than 25 years ago.
She was the producer of an idol who was

She said she was a producer famous for her wholehearted activities,
I have heard this from the president!

兄ちゃん、そこは『仕掛け人』言うてほしいわ。
プロデューサーっちゅうんは、どうも馴染めんのや

Brother, I wish you would say "trickster" there.

source:
そんなすごいプロデューサーだとは気づかず、

translatedstr:
I didn't realize she was such a great producer,

source:
あ、改めてご挨拶を。自分はプロジェクトルミナスと

Oh, and again, I'd like to say hello to Project Luminous and

……それで金成さんは今、

...... So Kim Sung is now,
What are they doing?

今か？　今は仕掛け稼業と投資半々ちゅうとこやな。
ファッションからペットフードまで幅広うな

Right now? Right now, I'm half in the gimmick business and half in the investment business.
A wide range of products from fashion to pet food.

せや、後で名刺交換せえへんか？　かつてワシが
心血注いだビジネスしてるっちゅうんが気に入った！

Well, why don't we exchange business cards later?
I like the fact that they put their heart and soul into their business!

source:
ま、兄ちゃんと取引するかは、まだわからんけどな、

translatedstr:
Well, I still don't know if I'm going to do business with my brother,
Depending on her future activities, she may come up with a good story.

source:
はい、よろしくお願いします！

Yes, please!

そうやなぁ、兄ちゃんのプロデューサーの腕前

Yes, I know, my brother is a good producer.

translatedstr:
If you don't improve your skills, I can't talk to you about work.
...... This is an assignment from me.

source: はい、わかりました！

source:
（金成さんか……。
思わぬところで出会ったな）
translatedstr:
(Kim Cheng or .......
(You met me in a place I didn't expect.)

source:
（金成さんは良し悪しの評価が分かれる人だと
聞いた事があるけど、悪い人には思えなかった）
translatedstr:
(Ms. Kim Seong is a person who has different evaluations of good and bad.
(I've heard of her, but she didn't sound like a bad girl)

source:
（それはそれとして、肩こりは綺麗に吹き飛んだ。
どうやら、これが『整った』効果らしい）
translatedstr:
(As it was, the stiffness in my shoulders blew away nicely.
(Apparently, this is the 'well-rounded' effect.)

source:
（プロデューサーの腕前、少しは上がった気がする。
……よし、サウナに行ってみよう）
translatedstr:
(I think I'm getting a little better at being a producer.
(...... Okay, let's go to the sauna)

source:
おう、兄ちゃん！　よお来た！
まあ、こっちに来ぃや
translatedstr:
Hey, bro! Hey, I'm here!
Well, come here.

source: あ、お疲れ様です！
translatedstr: Oh, thank you for your time!

source:
兄ちゃんが仕掛けとる、ええと……
何つったかいな？　ボーナス？
translatedstr:
My brother is setting up, uh, ......

source: プロジェクトルミナス、です
translatedstr: Project Luminous, that is.

source:
ああせやせや、ルミナスや！
噂は聞いとるで、けっこう人気あるやんか！
translatedstr:
Aaaseaseaseaseaseaseasease, luminous!

source: ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Thank you very much!

source:
若いっちゅうんに、なかなかやるやん！
見どころあんで、ホンマ！
translatedstr:
She's a young girl, but she's pretty good!
It's worth seeing, really!

source: バン！　バン！　バン！
translatedstr: Bang! Bang! Bang!

source: あ、ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Oh, thank you very much!

source:
ところで、兄ちゃん。
キョービ、アイドルビジネスて儲かんのんか？
translatedstr:
By the way, brother.
Kyobi, is the idol business profitable?

source:
そうですね……。頂点に立てば、おそらく。
ですが、何しろ群雄割拠状態なので、なかなか……
translatedstr:
Yes, ....... If you stand at the apex, perhaps.
But, after all, it's not easy to ......

source:
何、弱気吐いてんねんな！
ええか、兄ちゃんには才能がある！

What are you talking about?
Yeah, brother, you have a gift!

source:

My brother will grow more and more!

source:
あ、ありがとうございます。

source: そうや！　その意気や！

source: バン！　バン！　バン！
translatedstr: Bang! Bang! Bang!

source: いてて……
translatedstr: Please visit ......

source:
おっと、ワシ、そろそろ水風呂入ってくるわ。
ココのはアンダー１５℃でワシ好みやねん！　ほなな
translatedstr:
Oops, I'm going to take a water bath soon.
This one is 15 degrees under and I like it!

source: は、はい！　失礼します！

source:
（金成さんの言葉、お世辞半分だとしても嬉しい。
もっと頑張らないといけないな……）
translatedstr:
(I'm glad to hear that, even if it's only half flattery.
I need to work harder (......)

source:
おう、兄ちゃん！　こっち座りや！

translatedstr:
Hey, bro! Sit over here!

ぼちぼちです。ただ、大きな活動をするには資金が
必要なので、なかなか思うようにはいきません
translatedstr:
It's just that we need more funds for bigger activities.
It's not as easy as it sounds because you need

……よっしゃ、ワシが金儲けの指南したる！
translatedstr:
Well, I guess so, especially when you are young.
......Yes, I'll give you some pointers on how to make money!

source:
ビジネスにはな、そのプロジェクトに見合った
仕掛けと人選が必要なんや
translatedstr:
Businesses, you know, have to be able to match the project to the
It's a trick and people need to be selected.

source:
それには、最低限これだけのっちゅう、
初期投資用の資金が無いとアカン
translatedstr:
For that, at a minimum, this is all that is required,
No money for initial investment.

source:
でもな、これが逆に多過ぎてもアカンねん。

translatedstr:
But too much of it is bad.
If you don't pay for what you get, people will be lazy.

source:
なるほど。仕事と報酬の間には

translatedstr:
I see...between work and reward.
You can't have too much or too little.

source:
兄ちゃん、飲み込み早いわー。

translatedstr:
Brother, you swallow fast!
...... If that's the case, I'll test it on my brother.

source:
金集めには天脈・地脈・人脈の３つの要素がある。

translatedstr:
There are three elements to collecting money: natural veins, earthly veins, and human connections.
Of these, the most important is the heavenly vein that is loved by the money people and

translatedstr:
A natural vein is something you are born with.
It's not something you can get by with hard work and perseverance.

……どや？　このテスト、受ける気あるか？

この先、勝負を仕掛ける時に避けられない道です。

This is the inevitable path to take when setting up the game in the future.

かっかっ！　兄ちゃんならそう答えると思とったわ！
ほなら、次会う時までに、一皮剥けて来てみぃ！

I knew you would answer like that!
Well then, come back with a clean slate by the time we meet again!

source:
プロデューサーとしての腕前、
あげてきてくれへんか？
translatedstr:
Producer prowess,

source: はい、わかりました！
translatedstr: Yes, I understand!

source:
おっと、フィーバータイム前に水風呂入って来んと。
……ほな、愉しみにしてんで、兄ちゃん！

Oops, I should go take a water bath before fever time.
......Hey, I'll be looking forward to it, brother!

source:
（どれだけ俺がお金に愛されてるか、か……。
何をもって、それを証明するかわからないけど……）
translatedstr:
(How much money loves me, or .......

（とりあえず、プロデューサーとしての実力を

(For now, I'm just trying to see how good I am as a producer.

source:
おう、兄ちゃん！　待っとったで！

translatedstr:
Oh, brother! We've been waiting for you!

それと、ちゃ～んと課題クリアしたみたいやな！

Also, it looks like you completed your assignment!

source: ありがとうございます！

source:
兄ちゃんは、もっともっと伸びるで～
この金成が保証する！　頑張りや！

My brother will grow even more!
This Kanei assures you! Good luck!

source:
そう言っていただけると、

translatedstr:
If you say so,

source:
はははっ！
それは、サウナ効果とちゃうか～？

Haha!
That's the sauna effect, isn't it?

source:
それはそうと……俺、お金から
愛されてるってのが、どうしてもわからなくて……
translatedstr:
That said, ...... me, from the money.
I just don't know what it's like to be loved. ......

source:
かっかっか！
ンなモン、愛されてるに決まっとるやろが

Scintillating!
Of course they love you.

source: えっ……？

兄ちゃんの評判はワシの耳にも入っとるし、

translatedstr:
I've heard about your reputation,
I can see the look of motivation on her face now.

source:
プロジェクトルミナスやろ、兄ちゃんが手掛けとる
アイドル。あの子たちは皆ホンマモンや
translatedstr:
Project Luminous, right? My brother is working on it.
Idols...they're all the real deal.

source:
それだけの目ェを持った人間、そうはおらん。
天性の金儲けのセンスがあるっちゅうこっちゃ
translatedstr:
Not many people have that kind of vision.
She has a natural flair for making money.

source: ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Thank you very much!

source:
そして……兄ちゃん。
アンタには天脈だけやのうて強い人脈もある！
translatedstr:
And ...... brother.
You have not only a natural connection, but also a strong personal connection!

source:
陰日向で兄ちゃんを支えてくれよる優秀なスタッフ。
果報モンやで、ホンマ！
translatedstr:
Excellent staff by supporting my brother in the shadows.
It's a good thing, really!

source: バン！　バン！　バン！
translatedstr: Bang! Bang! Bang!

source: あいたたた……あ、ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Oh, thank you very much. ...... Oh, thank you very much!

source: （相変わらず背中が腫れ上がりそうな張り手だ……）
translatedstr: (Still the same back-swollen upholstery. ......)

source:
おっと、そろそろ水風呂に行かな。
ほなまたな、兄ちゃん！
translatedstr:
Oops, I should go to the water bath soon.
See you later, brother!

source:
（本物のアイドルと優秀なスタッフか……。
今日は差し入れでも買って帰ろうかな）
translatedstr:
(A real idol and an excellent staff or .......
(Maybe I'll buy some goodies to take home today.)

source: おっ、また会うたな、プロデューサーさん！
translatedstr: Whoa, we meet again, producer!

source:
ぷ、プロデューサーさんって……。
急にどうしたんですか、金成さん？
translatedstr:
Psst, producers are .......
What's going on all of a sudden, Ms. Kim Sung?

source:
ワシ、間違うたコト、言うてへんやろ？
それより、仕事の調子はどないや？
translatedstr:
I didn't say anything wrong, did I?
Anyway, how's work going?

source:
おかげさまで、いろいろと忙しくなってきました。
でも、仕事が増えた分、どれを選ぶか迷う事も多くて
translatedstr:
Thanks to this, we have been busy with many things.
But the more work I've had to do, the more I've had to choose which one I'm going to do.

source:
まあ、仕事選ぶんは大切かも知れんけどな、
若いうちは、まずやらせてみるこっちゃ
translatedstr:
Well, it may be important to choose the right job,
When you're young, you have to let them try first.

source:
シクジんのもエエ勉強やし、

translatedstr:
It's also a good way to learn,
Remember, what you're not good at is what you're not good at.

source:
ワシ自身、若い頃は散々シクジリまくったわぁ。
今みたいにマニュアルなんぞ無かった時代やしな
translatedstr:
I myself was a young man, and I was a lot of times a shikuzuri.
There were no manuals like there are today.

source:
そうなんですか？
でも、自分の器以上の仕事をさせるわけには……
translatedstr:
Is that so?
But I can't let you do more work than you're equipped to do. ......

source:
コップに注いだ水は確かに器以上には入らん。

translatedstr:
The water poured into the cup certainly doesn't go into more than the vessel.

source:
器以上に盛る事も出来んねん。
要はプロデューサーの腕次第っちゅうこっちゃ
translatedstr:
I can't even serve more than a bowl.
The bottom line is that it depends on the skill of the producer.

source:
俺の腕次第で、アイドルの子たちの伸びしろも
増えていくって事ですか？
translatedstr:
Depending on my skill, the idols' children can grow.
Does that mean there will be an increase?

source: せや。サ友からのささやかなアドバイスや
translatedstr: Well, here's a little advice from a friend of mine....

source: ありがとうございました！
translatedstr: Thank you very much!

source:
ちゅう訳で恒例のワシからの課題や。腕や、腕！
次会う時までに、その腕、磨いといたってや
translatedstr:
So here's my annual assignment: arms, arms, arms!
You'd better brush up on those skills by the next time I see you.

source:
急に来ましたね。……わかりました。
プロデューサーの腕、ピカピカに磨いてきます
translatedstr:
You came here suddenly. ...... I understand.
I'm going to go polish my producer's arms to a shine.

source:
（プロデューサーの腕次第……か。
俺自身、もっともっと成長しないとな！）
translatedstr:
(Is it up to the producer ......?
(I've got a lot more growing up to do, myself!)

source: おっ、元気しとったか、プロデューサーさん！
translatedstr: Whoa, how are you, producer?

source:
はい、おかげさまで。
金成さんの方はいかがですか？
translatedstr:
Yes, thanks to you.
How about you, Kinsei-san?

source:
サウナ効果で、
身体も金回りもメチャメチャ調子エエわ！
translatedstr:
Sauna effect,
My body and my finances are in great shape!

source: （サウナ効果と金回りは関係ないような……）
translatedstr: (Sauna effect has nothing to do with money circulation. ......)

source:
それはそうと、ちゃ～んと課題クリアしたようやな！
プロデューサーさんは、さらに伸びるで～
translatedstr:
Well, it looks like you completed your assignment!
Producers will grow even more.

source: ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Thank you very much!

source:
ルミナスの活躍な、ワシも良うＴＶで観てんで。
無茶振りに応えようと頑張る姿、最高やな、ホンマ
translatedstr:
I also watch Luminous on TV.
I love the way she tries her best to respond to the recklessness of the situation, really.

source:
金成さんのアドバイス、
ルミナスの活動に活用させてもらってます
translatedstr:
Advice from Ms. Kim Seong,
I'm using it for Luminous activities.

source: 本当にありがとうございました！
translatedstr: Thank you so much!

source:
礼には及ばんて！
それより、今度一緒にメシ食いに行こか！
translatedstr:
Don't thank me!
Anyway, let's go out for a meal together sometime!

source:
はい、是非！
『サウナ飯』ってヤツですね
translatedstr:
Yes, by all means!
Sauna food.

source:
まあ、ここのサウナ飯も美味しいねんけどな、
話する場ァとしては、ちとアレや……
translatedstr:
Well, the sauna food here is good, too,
It's not a good place to talk about it. ......

source: （……どういう意味だろう？）
translatedstr: (...... what does that mean?)

source:
おお、ワシ、水風呂行ってくるわ！
その後の外気浴で整いそうや！　ほなまた！
translatedstr:
Oh, I'm going to take a bath!
I'm sure I'll be in better shape after the air bath! See you soon!

source:
（その後、俺も整った！
この後の仕事もバリバリこなせそうだ！）
translatedstr:
(Then I got mine in order!
I'm sure I'll be able to get some work done after this!)

source:
おっ、仕事はあんじょう回っとるか、
プロデューサーさん！
translatedstr:
Oh, work is going well,
Producer!

source: あ、はい！ おかげさまで！
translatedstr: Ah, yes! Thanks to you!

source:
さよか。仕事が回れば金も回る、
これ以上の幸せは無いなぁ。かっかっかっ！
translatedstr:
If the work gets done, the money gets done,
I couldn't be happier!

source:
『金は天下の回り物』って言いますけど、
俺のところなんて、ただの通過点ですよ
translatedstr:
They say, "Money comes and goes,

source:
それでエエねんて。金っちゅうんはな、
貯め込むだけやったら、タダの渋チン……
translatedstr:
That's what's good about money,
If all you do is hoard, you're a free reluctant Chin ......

source:
金にとっても『死に金』や。
せやから、回って来たら回さなアカン
translatedstr:
It's 'dead money' for money too.
So, when it comes around, you have to turn it.

source:
何も無駄遣いせえっちゅう話ちゃうで？
使う時には使えっちゅう話や
translatedstr:
I'm not talking about wasting money.
I'm just saying, use it when you have to.

source: それが活きたお金の使い方って事なんですね
translatedstr: So that's how you spend your live money.

source:
そういうこっちゃ。金もマグロとおんなじでな、
動かな死んでまうねん
translatedstr:
That's the thing, money is like tuna,
If you don't move, you'll die

source:
ちゅうワケで、金の動かし方。今回の課題はコレや。
金の動きは仕事の動きや
translatedstr:
So, this is how to move money.
The movement of money is the movement of work and

source: おっきく動かすにはもっともっと腕をあげないかん！
translatedstr: To move it big, you have to raise your arm more and more!

source:
わかりました！
プロデューサーとして、成長してきます！
translatedstr:
I understand!
As a producer, I will grow!

source:
かっかっかっ！　エエ目してんで今の自分！
……おっ、他の客が来よった。本日のサ育はここまで
translatedstr:
I'm looking good right now!
...... Oh, another guest has arrived, and that's it for today's Sacramento education.

source:
（使う時に使ってこそのお金か……。
……早く一人前のプロデューサーになりたいな）
translatedstr:
(Is it the money you have to spend when you spend it. ......
(...... can't wait to be a full-fledged producer)

source:
おっ、プロデューサーさん！
何してんねんな、早よ、こっちこっち！
translatedstr:
Whoa, producer!
What are you doing? Come on, come on, come on!

source: あ、はい。今、行きます！
translatedstr: Oh, yes, I'm coming!

source: ほほう、金に好かれそうな面構えになってきたなぁ
translatedstr: Hoho, you've got a face that money seems to love.

source:
またまた、そんな信憑性の無い事を……。
それで、そんなに慌ててどうしたんですか？
translatedstr:
Again, such an unreliable thing .......
So, what happened in such a hurry?

source:
まだ当面先の話で、実現するかわからんけどな、
折り入って話しときたい事があんねん
translatedstr:
I don't know if it will happen yet in the foreseeable future,
There's something I need to talk to you about.

source:
……実はな、海外で
ファッションショーを手掛ける事になったんや
translatedstr:
...... Actually, you know, overseas.
I'm going to put on a fashion show.

source: それは、すごいじゃないですか！
translatedstr: Isn't that great?

source:
そこでプロデューサーさんに相談や。世界レベルで
通用する子をルミナスメンバーから育てて欲しい
translatedstr:
So, I consulted with the producer and we went to World Level.
I'd like to see a passable child be raised from a luminous member.

source:
確かに、今のままでもアイドルとして充分輝いとる。
……でも、世界となったら、そら話は別モンや
translatedstr:
Certainly, she shines enough as an idol as it is now.
...... but when it comes to the world, it's a different story.

source:
実現するかビミョーな話で心苦しいとこやけど……
今後、それを踏まえて動いてもらえると有難いわ
translatedstr:
I'm not sure if it's going to happen, and I'm having a hard time believing that it will. ......
I'd appreciate it if you could work with that in the future.

source:
……まあ、ココで深く話す事でもあらへんし、
今ンとこは心の片隅にでも置いといてくれんか
translatedstr:
...... Well, it's nothing to talk about in depth here,
Can you keep it in the back of your mind for now?

source:
なるほど……わかりました。
覚えておきます
translatedstr:
I see. ...... I understand.
I'll keep that in mind.

source:
おっとアカン！　大事なモン忘れるとこやったわ。
課題クリア、おめでとうさん
translatedstr:
I almost forgot something important.
Congratulations on completing your assignment!

source:
プロデューサーさんは、もっともっと伸びるで！
ほな、水風呂行ってくるわ！
translatedstr:
Producers will grow more and more!
Well, I'm off to the water bath!

source: ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Thank you very much!

source:
（世界レベルか……。だけどルミナスには
まだまだやらなくてはならない事が残ってる……）
translatedstr:
(World Level or ....... But for Luminous.
(There's still a lot left to do: ......)

source:
（金成さんからのお話はありがたいけど、
まだ自分の中で留めておいた方が良さそうだな……）
translatedstr:
(Though I appreciate hearing from Ms. Kinnari,
I guess I should still keep it to myself (......)

source:
（……それはそうと、
整った後のイオニック飲料水は最高だ！）
translatedstr:
(...... that's it,
(Ionic drinking water is the best after it's been prepared!)

source:
（金成さんから大至急会いたいとの電話連絡があり、
指定された目的地へと向かうことにした）
translatedstr:
(Kinsei-san called me to see me ASAP,
(Decided to go to the designated destination)

source: （……といっても、いつものサウナだけど）
translatedstr: (......, but it's always a sauna)

source:
おっ、プロデューサーさん！
すまんな、忙しいトコ呼び出してもうて
translatedstr:
Whoa, producer!
Sorry to call you out of my busy schedule.

source:
いえ、大丈夫です！
……それで、お話というのは？
translatedstr:
No, it's okay!
...... So, what's the story?

source:
そうそう、マエ話した海外でファッションショーな、
具体的に話が進み出したんや！
translatedstr:
Yes, yes, the fashion show abroad that I told you about,
We're starting to talk about specifics!

source: 本当ですか！　おめでとうございます！
translatedstr: Really? Congratulations!

source:
時期はまだ来年の秋冬頃と先なんやけどな、
改めて頼んますわ
translatedstr:
The time is still a long way off, though, around next fall/winter,
I'll ask you again.

source:
是非ともプロデューサーさんと仕事がしたい！
ルミナスの参加メンバーとコラボさせて欲しいねん！
translatedstr:
I would very much like to work with the producer!
I want to collaborate with the participating members of Luminous!

source: ……お話、ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Thank you for the ...... story!

source:
とは言え相手は世界や。ある程度根回しするにしても
最低限、それに見合うパフォーマンスが必要になる
translatedstr:
However, we are dealing with the world, and even if we do put some groundwork in place, we will still have to do so.
At the very least, you'll need to perform up to it.

source:
これはアイドルだけの話やない。
彼女らを支え、動かすプロデューサーの技量も然りや
translatedstr:
This is not just about idols.
The skill of the producers who support and move these girl is also a factor.

source: ……行けるか？
translatedstr: Can you go to ......?

source:
最低限なんてダメですよ。
金成さんの仕掛け、最大限でお応えしてみせます！
translatedstr:
Minimum is no good.
I will do my utmost to respond to Ms. Kinnari's tricks!

source:
おおっ！
それでこそ、ワシの見込んだ男や！　ありがとうな！
translatedstr:
Oh, wow!
That's the man I wanted to be!

source:
ワシが求めんのは超一流の腕前や。世界相手に
アイドル動かすんには、必ず必要や
translatedstr:
What I'm looking for is top-notch skill, against the world.
It is necessary to move the idol.

source: わかりました。絶対に到達してみせます！
translatedstr: Okay, I will definitely reach it!

source: よう言うた！　頼むで、プロデューサー！
translatedstr: You said it! Please, producer!

source: はい！
translatedstr: Yes!

source:
（金成さんの信頼を裏切る訳にはいかない。
今はただルミナスを信じて全力で頑張るしかない！）
translatedstr:
(We cannot betray Ms. Kim Sung's trust.
Now we just have to believe in Luminous and give it our all!)

source:
おっ、プロデューサーさん！
こっちや、こっち！
translatedstr:
Whoa, producer!
This way, this way!

source: あ、はい！
translatedstr: Ah, yes!

source: （金成さんは、どこにいても変わらないな）
translatedstr: (Kim Sung, you never change, no matter where you are.)

source: まずは課題クリア、おめでとうさん
translatedstr: First of all, congratulations on completing your assignment.

source:
ようこの課題をクリアしてきたな。
プロデューサーとして、さらに伸びるで！
translatedstr:
You've done a great job of completing this assignment.
As a producer, you'll grow even more!

source: ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Thank you very much!

source:
プロデューサーさんには、もう無茶苦茶感謝しとる！
ルミナスは世界のどこにでも通用するアイドルや！
translatedstr:
I am already absurdly grateful to the producer!
Luminous is an idol that can be used anywhere in the world!

source:
そんなに褒められると、少し照れくさいですが……。
ありがとうございます！
translatedstr:
I'm a little embarrassed to be praised that much. ......
Thank you very much!

source:
プロデューサーさんのその手腕……
このワシのモトで振るってみる気ィ、無いか？
translatedstr:
That skill of the producer: ......
Are you ready to try your hand at this eagle moto?

source: ええっ！？
translatedstr: Eh?

source: （こ、これって、引き抜きってやつじゃ……）
translatedstr: (Isn't this what they call pulling out? ......)

source:
プロデューサーさんを支えてるスタッフや、
育ててきたアイドルの子たちを悪ぅ言う気は無いんや
translatedstr:
The staff and supporting producers,
I'm not trying to say anything bad about the idols I've raised.

source:
ただ純粋にプロデューサーさんの腕が欲しい！
ワシの右腕、いずれは後継者として育ててみたい！
translatedstr:
I just genuinely want the producer's arm!
I would like to raise her as my right hand man and eventually as my successor!

source:
おたくの事務所には筋を通す！
要求する額面は一括で全額支払う！
translatedstr:
It makes sense to your office!
The amount requested is to be paid in full in a lump sum!

source:
ワシの生きてきた証でもある金を、
一気に使う時が来たと、ビビッと来たんや！
translatedstr:
The gold is the proof of my life,
I was scared that it was time to use it all at once!

source: 俺をそこまで高く評価してくれた事、感謝します
translatedstr: Thank you for thinking so highly of me.

source:
…………でも、申し訳ありません！
俺には、やらなくちゃいけない事があるんです
translatedstr:
Sorry, also at ............!
I have something I have to do.

source: ……どうしてもアカンか？
translatedstr: ...... Why are you so acorned?

source: ……はい

今すぐに答える必要は無いねんで？
それでもアカンか？
translatedstr:
I don't have to answer right now, do I?
Still a problem?

source: はい！
translatedstr: Yes!

source:
……さよか。
かっかっかっ、この金成大蔵、見事にフラれたわい！
translatedstr: ...... Sayoka.

source: ……すみません
translatedstr: Sorry ......

source:
もう、いつまでショボくれてんねんな～。
話は水に流して、昼食を愉しもうやないか！
translatedstr:
How long are you going to keep on shabbing!
Let's let bygones be bygones and enjoy our lunch!

source: あ、はい！
translatedstr: Ah, yes!

source:
（金成さんのお話を断った事に悔いは無い。
今まで以上に、この仕事を頑張っていこう！）
translatedstr:
(I have no regrets about turning down Kinsei-san's offer.
Let's work harder at this job than we ever have before!)

source: トゥルルルルル……ピッ
translatedstr: Trullu ...... bleep

source: もしもし？
translatedstr: Hello?

source:
おう、兄ちゃん！　ワシやワシ、ワシ！
ちょお待て、新手の詐欺ちゃうで！　金成や！
translatedstr:
Oh, brother! Eagle, eagle, eagle!
Wait a minute, it's not a new scam!

source:
ああ、金成さんでしたか！　お疲れ様です。
……どうかされましたか？
translatedstr:
Oh, it was Ms. Kim Seong! Thank you for your hard work.
...... What did you do?

source:
今な、事務所近くの喫茶店におんねんけど、
すぐ来れたりするか？
translatedstr:
I'm at a coffee shop near my office,
Can you come soon?

source: あ、はい、わかりました！
translatedstr: Ah, yes, I understand!

source: お待たせしました！
translatedstr: Thank you for your patience!

source:
おっ、兄ちゃん！
今度ワシな、新手のビジネス仕掛けんねん！
translatedstr:
Whoa, bro!
I'm going to start a new kind of business!

source:
無名やけどエエセンスしたファッションデザイナーと
話つけて、若者向けの新ブランドを立ち上げんねや
translatedstr:
A fashion designer who is unknown but has a good sense of fashion and
Talk to them and start a new brand for young people.

source:
けどな、無名やし、ホンマに行けるかどうか、
このワシにもわからん……
translatedstr:
But I'm not sure if I can really go,
Even this eagle doesn't understand ......

source:
そこでや！　試作品を兄ちゃんトコに送るさけ、
若い子ォの反応をな、知らせて欲しいんや
translatedstr:
So, I'm going to send the prototype to my brother's office,
I want you to let me know how the young people react.

source:
速乾性の機能優先の優れモンやで！
どや、悪い取引ちゃうやろ？
translatedstr:
It is an excellent product that prioritizes quick-drying functionality!
Hey, it's not a bad deal, is it?

source:
ありがとうございます！
みんなに着てもらって、感想をお伝えします！
translatedstr:
Thank you very much!
I will have everyone try it on and let you know what they think!

source:
（事務所への帰り道、俺は金成さんに呼び出され、
ルミナス事務所近くの喫茶店へと向かっていた）
translatedstr:
(On my way back to the office, I was called by Kinsei-san,
(They were headed to a coffee shop near the Luminous office.)

source: お待たせしました、金成さん！
translatedstr: Sorry to keep you waiting, Kinsei-san!

source:
おっ、兄ちゃん！　こないだ立ち上げた
ファッションブランドな、どエラく好調やねん！
translatedstr:
Whoa, bro! I started up the other day.
Fashion brands are doing very well!

source: それはおめでとうございます！
translatedstr: Congratulations on that!

source:
ほんでな、今度、ワシが投資している製菓店と
タイアップさせよ思てな……
translatedstr:
So, I'm going to go to a confectionery store that I invested in.
Let's tie it up: ......

source:
ブランド発展のため、兄ちゃんトコの若い子ォの
協力、また頼んますわ！　このとーり！
translatedstr:
For the development of the brand, the young children of my brother's family
Cooperation, I'll ask you again!

source: わ、わかりましたから、頭を上げてください
translatedstr: Okay, okay, please raise your head.

source:
新デザインのシャツと一緒に菓子も回すわ。
若い子、好っきゃろ？
translatedstr:
I'll turn in the candy along with the newly designed shirts.
You like young girls, don't you?

source:
ありがとうございます。
みんな喜ぶと思います！
translatedstr:
Thank you very much.
I think everyone will be pleased!

source:
（事務所への帰り道、俺は金成さんからの電話で
ルミナス事務所近くの喫茶店へと呼び出された）
translatedstr:
(On the way back to the office, I got a call from Kinsei-san.
(Called to a coffee shop near the Luminous office.)

source: 金成さん、お待たせしました！
translatedstr: Thank you for your patience, Kinsei-san!

source:
おっ、プロデューサーさん！
わざわざ呼び出してスマンなぁ
translatedstr:
Whoa, producer!
Sorry to call you all the way out here.

source:
いえいえ、お気になさらず。
……それで、今日は？
translatedstr:
No, no, don't worry about it.
......So, what's today?

source:
製菓店とのタイアップ効果もあってな、
ファッションブランド、ホンマ順調やねん！
translatedstr:
There's also the effect of the tie-up with the confectionery store,
The fashion brand is really doing well!

source: ほいで今度、海外にも進出する事にしたんや
translatedstr: And now we've decided to expand overseas.

source: もう海外進出ですか。すごいですね！
translatedstr: You've already made your way overseas, isn't that great?

source:
でもな、今抱えとるデザイナーだけやと
明らかにキャパオーバーやねん
translatedstr:
But, you know, if it's just the designers we have now...
It's clearly overcapacity.

source:
でな、知り合いのデザイナーを何人かテストして、
やっとひとり、ワシの目ェに止まった奴がおったんや
translatedstr:
So, I tested a few designers I know,
Finally, one of them caught my eye.

source:
そいつがデザインした、海外でもイケる『楽しい』を
テーマにした自信作が上がったんはエエねんけど……
translatedstr:
She designed a "fun" product that can be used overseas as well.
It's great that you've come up with a confident work on the theme, but ......

source:
仰りたい事はわかりました。ルミナスの子たちで
よければ、また協力させてください
translatedstr:
I understand what you are saying, with the luminous children.
If you don't mind, let me help you again.

source:
ホンマか！　助かるわ！
ほんなら、早速送らせてもらうわ！
translatedstr:
That's a big help!
Well, I'll send it to you as soon as I can!

source: こちらこそ、いつもありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Thank you for your continued support as well!

source:
（事務所への帰り道、俺は金成さんからの電話で
とあるレストランへと呼び出された）
translatedstr:
(On the way back to the office, I got a call from Kinsei-san.
(I was summoned to a certain restaurant.)

source: お待たせしました！
translatedstr: Thank you for your patience!

source:
おっ、プロデューサーさん！
今日、時間、大丈夫なん？
translatedstr:
Whoa, producer!
Are you sure you have time today?

source:
はい。特に急ぎの仕事は入ってませんから。
……それで、今日は？
translatedstr:
Yes, I don't have any urgent business.
......So, what's today?

source:
今度ワシな、
スーパー銭湯を手掛けることになったんや
translatedstr:
Next time, I'll be an eagle,
I'm going to be working on a super public bathhouse.

source:
スーパー銭湯ですか。
それはまた手広い事業ですね
translatedstr:
Is it a super public bathhouse?
That's another extensive undertaking.

source:
でもな、ただのスーパー銭湯じゃおもんない！
ちゅう事で、参考に各地の温泉巡りをして来たんや
translatedstr:
But, you know, a mere super public bath is not interesting!
So I went on a tour of hot springs around the country for reference.

source:
土産代わりに、温泉巡りでインスパイアされて作った
デザインのＴシャツ、送らせてもらうわ！
translatedstr:
Instead of souvenirs, I made them inspired by a tour of hot springs.
I'll send you a T-shirt with my design!

source: ありがとうございます！
translatedstr: Thank you very much!

source:
金っちゅうんはな、
喜んでもらえるために、あんねんで
translatedstr:
Money is the key,
Anneende to make you happy.

source:
……今更言うんもアレやねんけどな、
今日は一緒にメシ食う約束、果たさせてもらうで
translatedstr:
......I know it's too late to say this, but...,
I'll make good on my promise to have dinner with you today.

source:
おっ、プロデューサーさん！
会えてよかったわ！
translatedstr:
Whoa, producer!
It's good to see you!

source:
あれ、金成さん！
こんなところでどうしたんですか？
translatedstr:
Oh, Ms. Kim Seong!
What's going on here?

source:
おたくの事務所に
挨拶してきたトコなんや
translatedstr:
Your office.
I just came to say hello.

source:
今までプロデューサーさんとルミナスには
エラい世話になったさかいなぁ
translatedstr:
I've been a producer and a luminous one so far.
I owe you so much.

source:
世話だなんて、そんな……。
こちらこそ、金成さんにはいろいろ教えて頂きました
translatedstr:
It's such a ...... that it's a care.
Thank you, too, Ms. Kinnari, for teaching me so much!

source:
ほんでな、ルミナスの為にウチのトップデザイナーに
デザインさせたＴシャツを回させてもらう事にしたわ
translatedstr:
So, I've got our top designer for Luminous.
I've decided to let you circulate the t-shirts I had you design.

source: え！？　ル、ルミナスのＴシャツを、ですか？
translatedstr: What? Luminous T-shirts, you say?

source:
話はもう高木社長と全部つけてある。
もちろん、お礼やから、タダやで
translatedstr:
I've already had all the talks with Manager Takagi.
Of course, it's a thank-you, so it's free.

source:
タダっちゅうても、失敗作とかちゃうで！
このワシ自ら何度もダメ出し入れた力作や！
translatedstr:
Free doesn't mean a failed product!
This is a masterpiece that I myself have repeatedly rejected!

source:
ルミナスの『華やかさ』をテーマにした自信作や。
気に入ってくれるとエエんやけどな
translatedstr:
I'm confident that Luminous' theme of "glamour" is a good one.
I hope you like it.

source:
絶対気に入りますよ！
ありがとうございます！
translatedstr:
You will absolutely love it!
Thank you very much!

source:
……ところで、その旅行鞄、
どこかへ出張されるんですか？
translatedstr:
...... By the way, that travel bag,
Are you going on a business trip somewhere?

source:
新規の儲け話のネタ集めに
世界を飛び回って来るっちゅうだけの話や
translatedstr:
To collect new profitable stories.
I'm just saying that I'm going to fly around the world.

source:
せ、世界中を……ですか？
それで、今度は何を仕掛ける気なんです？
translatedstr:
Is ...... the only way to get around the world?
So, what are you going to do now?

source: それはな……まだヒ・ミ・ツや♪
translatedstr: That's ...... still a secret... ♪

source: ははは……タフですね、金成さんは
translatedstr: Haha ...... tough, Kim Sung!

source:
取り敢えずは例のファッションショーや。
……絶対に成功させよな
translatedstr:
For now, let's go to the fashion show.
...... Make sure it's a success!

source: はい！
translatedstr: Yes!

source:
ほな、そろそろ行くわ。
フィンランド行きの飛行機に乗らなアカンねん
translatedstr:
Well, I'd better get going.
I have to get on a plane to Finland.

source:
フィンランドって……
まさかサウナ巡りじゃないですよね？
translatedstr:
Finland is ......
You're not going on a sauna tour, are you?

source:
ん～、１５点ちゅうトコやな。
今度会う時までにツッコミの勉強しといてや
translatedstr:
Well, I would give it a score of 15.
You'd better learn how to make a joke by the time I see you again.

source:
（俺が金成さんくらいの歳になった時、
あのバイタリティを持っているだろうか？）
translatedstr:
(When I was about Kinsei-san's age,
Would she have that vitality?)

source:
（……そんな先のことは分からないけど、
今この時を、もっと精力的に頑張っていこう！）
translatedstr:
(...... I don't know about that far ahead,
Let's make this moment more energetic!)
